lessons.title: Step 1: Create your console app project

sections.heading: Create a new project
sections.body_html:
Open your IDE and create a new “Console App” project. Choose a name and location, then confirm.

  1. File → New → Project
  2. Select Console App
  3. Name it HelloWorld and click Create
Tip: Keep steps concise.
// main.cpp
#include <iostream>
int main(){ std::cout << "Hello, course template!" << std::endl; return 0; }

sections.heading: Build & run
sections.body_html:
Build the solution, then run the app. You should see your message in a terminal window.

Warning: Verify your compiler/toolchain.
